org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap

Class SimpleAttributeMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap.AttributeMapper
      • org.forgerock.opendj.rest2ldap.SimpleAttributeMapper

  • public final class SimpleAttributeMapper
extends AttributeMapper
    An attribute mapper which provides a simple mapping from a JSON value to a single LDAP attribute.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleAttributeMapper decoder(Function<ByteString,?,Void> f)
      Sets the decoder which will be used for converting LDAP attribute values to JSON values.
      SimpleAttributeMapper defaultJSONValue(Object defaultValue)
      Sets the default JSON value which should be substituted when the LDAP attribute is not found in the LDAP entry.
      SimpleAttributeMapper encoder(Function<Object,ByteString,Void> f)
      Sets the encoder which will be used for converting JSON values to LDAP attribute values.
      SimpleAttributeMapper isBinary()
      Indicates that JSON values are base 64 encodings of binary data.
      T isRequired()
      Indicates that the LDAP attribute is mandatory and must be provided during create requests.
      T isSingleValued()
      Indicates that multi-valued LDAP attribute should be represented as a single-valued JSON value, rather than an array of values.
      String toString() 
      T writability(WritabilityPolicy policy)
      Indicates whether or not the LDAP attribute supports updates.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • decoder

        public SimpleAttributeMapper decoder(Function<ByteString,?,Void> f)
        Sets the decoder which will be used for converting LDAP attribute values to JSON values.
        Parameters:
        f - The function to use for decoding LDAP attribute values.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • defaultJSONValue

        public SimpleAttributeMapper defaultJSONValue(Object defaultValue)
        Sets the default JSON value which should be substituted when the LDAP attribute is not found in the LDAP entry.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - The default JSON value.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • encoder

        public SimpleAttributeMapper encoder(Function<Object,ByteString,Void> f)
        Sets the encoder which will be used for converting JSON values to LDAP attribute values.
        Parameters:
        f - The function to use for encoding LDAP attribute values.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • isBinary

        public SimpleAttributeMapper isBinary()
        Indicates that JSON values are base 64 encodings of binary data. Calling this method is equivalent to the following: 
         mapper.decoder(...); // function that converts binary data to base 64
 mapper.encoder(...); // function that converts base 64 to binary data
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • isRequired

        public final T isRequired()
        Indicates that the LDAP attribute is mandatory and must be provided during create requests.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • isSingleValued

        public final T isSingleValued()
        Indicates that multi-valued LDAP attribute should be represented as a single-valued JSON value, rather than an array of values.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.

      • writability

        public final T writability(WritabilityPolicy policy)
        Indicates whether or not the LDAP attribute supports updates. The default is WritabilityPolicy.READ_WRITE.
        Parameters:
        policy - The writability policy.
        Returns:
        This attribute mapper.
